# argmin()

**Instance Method**

Returns the index of the element with the lowest value, ignoring missing elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func argmin() -> Int?
```

## Finding an Element Index

- **argmax()**: Returns the index of the element with the highest value, ignoring missing elements.
